summary: "Gilligan's Island" is an American comedy TV show about seven people who get stuck on an island after their boat sinks. The main characters include Gilligan (Bob Denver), the Skipper (Alan Hale Jr.), and Ginger (Tina Louise). They have funny adventures trying to survive and leave the island, but Gilligan usually messes things up. The show aired from 1964 to 1967 and had 98 episodes. It was very popular and still is watched today.
title: Gilligan's Island
